desc:
Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-LEFT
Conjures a slow but powerful meteor from the sky, dealing massive damage over a large area.
Mana Cost: 50
Total Damage: 400% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 330%)
 (Earth: 70%)
Range: 18 Blocks
Area of Effect: 5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Improve your Main Attack's damage and range when using a wand. </br> Main Attack Damage: +5% </br>Main Attack Range: +2 Blocks
Reduce the mana cost of Meteor. </br> Mana Cost: -10
Drastically increase the speed of your Meteor ability.
Improve your Main Attack's damage and range when using a wand. </br> Main Attack Damage: +5% </br>Main Attack Range: +2 Blocks
Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-RIGHT </br> Instantly teleport in the direction you're facing. </br> Mana Cost: 25 </br>Range: 16 Blocks
For every 2% or 2 Raw Spell Damage you have from items, gain +1/5s Mana Regen (Max 5/5s)

Click Combo: RIGHT-LEFT-RIGHT </br> Heals you and nearby allies in  a large area around you. (When healing others, you can't heal more than 50% of their max health) </br> Mana Cost: 35 </br>Total Heal: 15% (of your max health) </br>Range: 5 Blocks </br>Duration: 0.6s
Reduce the mana cost of Teleport. </br> Mana Cost: -5

Click Combo: RIGHT-RIGHT-LEFT
Conjures a fast-moving ice snake that damages and slows enemies.
Mana Cost: 30
Total Damage: 175% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 120%)
 (Water: 55%)
Range: 18 Blocks
Area of Effect: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Effect: 40% Slowness to Enemies
Duration: 3s
Increase your base damage from all Air attacks. </br> </br>Air Damage: +3-4 </br>Air Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Thunder attacks. </br> </br>Thunder Damage: +1-8 </br>Thunder Damage: +10%
Increase your base damage from all Water attacks. </br> </br>Water Damage: +2-4 </br>Water Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Fire attacks. </br> </br>Fire Damage: +3-5 </br>Fire Damage: +15%
Increase your base damage from all Earth attacks. </br> </br>Earth Damage: +2-4 </br>Earth Damage: +20%

When using Teleport, slash through the air and deal damage to enemies you pierce.

Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 75%)
 (Air: 25%)
Area of Effect: 1.5 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

After casting Meteor, generate 3 lightning strikes and deal additional damage.

Total Damage: +45% (of your DPS, per strike)
 (Damage: +30%)
 (Thunder: +15%)
Area of Effect: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

Meteor and Ophanim will leave a sigil of fire on the ground that damages enemies every 0.4s.

Total Damage: 40% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 25%)
 (Fire: 15%)
Area of Effect: 7 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Duration: 8s
Cooldown: 8s

Heal emits a strong light, damaging nearby enemies.
Arcane Transfer will damage nearby enemies when transferring 30+ Mana.

Total Damage: 100% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 70%)
 (Water: 30%)

Increase the damage of Meteor.

Total Damage: +120% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +90%)
 (Earth: +30%)

Your Main Attack will add +1 Winded to enemies you hit. (Max 10, 0.2s Cooldown)
Ice Snake will deal additional damage to enemies for every Winded they have.
Winded will decay once every 4s.

Total Damage: 15% (of your DPS, per Winded)
 (Damage: 10%)
 (Water: 5%)

When casting Meteor, instead summon 2 orbs of light with 200 Health that will attack when you use your Main Attack.
When they damage an enemy, they lose 20% of their Health. They can be healed back.
Mana Cost: +30
Total Damage: 120% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 90%)
 (Water: 15%)
 (Thunder: 15%)
Range: 22 Blocks

Meteor, Ice Snake, and Wind Slash will add 13 Mana to a Mana Bank for every aggressive enemy you hit. With Thunderstorm, Mana gain from Meteor is reduced to 4. </br> Heal will now transfer the contents of your Mana Bank into usable Mana instead of healing.
Reduce the mana cost of Heal. </br> Mana Cost: -5
Heal and Arcane Transfer will purify allies of all negative effects and fire. </br> </br>Cooldown: 3s

Ice Snake will follow the direction you're facing, allowing you to control it.

Total Damage: +40% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +25%)
 (Water: +15%)
Teleport will blind enemies, confusing them for a brief period of time. </br> </br>Effect: Blindness to Enemies </br>Duration: 1s

Meteor and Ophanim will deal additional damage to enemies for every Winded they have.

Total Damage: 30% (of your DPS, per Winded)
 (Damage: 25%)
 (Earth: 5%)

Total Damage: 10% (of your DPS, with Thunderstorm, per Winded)
 (Damage: 8%)
 (Earth: 2%)

Total Damage: 3% (of your DPS, with Ophanim, per Winded)
 (Damage: 2%)
 (Earth: 1%)
Increase your Heal's range. </br> </br>Range: +2 Blocks
Increase your maximum Mana Bank by +30.
Reduce the mana cost of Ice Snake. </br> Mana Cost: -5
Healing 120% of your max health within 10s will apply a damage bonus to every player you've healed. </br> </br>Effect: 40% Damage Bonus to Allies </br>Duration: 7s </br>Cooldown: 15s
Reduce the mana cost of Teleport. </br> Mana Cost: -5

When your Mana Bank reaches 30, your Main Attack will explode upon impact with enemies.

Total Damage: 200% (Main Attack Damage)
 (Damage: 200%)
Area of Effect: 4 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Teleport will trigger 2 times in quick succession. </br> </br>Range: -4 Blocks

Ice Snake will leave a sigil of ice beneath you that slows and damages enemies every 0.8s. Allies standing on the sigil will be immune to knockback.

Total Damage: 20% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 15%)
 (Water: 5%)
Area of Effect: 7 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Effects: 15% Slowness to Enemies, per hit (Max 60%) Knockback Immunity to Allies
Duration: 8s
Cooldown: 8s
Increases the health of Ophanim's orbs by +800 and reduces the damage they take when attacking by -5%.

Ice Snake will summon 3 snakes.

Total Damage: +50% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +35%)
 (Water: +15%)
For every 5/3s Lifesteal you have from items, gain +1% Spell Damage (Max 50%)

Teleport will deal additional damage to enemies for every Winded they have.

Total Damage: 16% (of your DPS, per Winded)
 (Damage: 10%)
 (Thunder: 3%)
 (Air: 3%)
For every 1% </br>Water Damage Bonus you have from items, buff Heal's healing power by +0.3%. (Max +75%)
Heal becomes slower and stronger, pulsing 2 more times for greater healing. </br> </br>Pulse Self Heal: 20% (of your max health) </br>Duration: 1.2s </br>Delay: 1.5s (per pulse)
Pyrokinesis will add +1 Mana every 0.25s to your Mana Bank when hitting an aggressive enemy. </br> </br>Duration: 2.5s

Increase the damage of Ophanim.

Total Damage: +30% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +20%)
 (Air: +10%)
If you kill an enemy with Winded on them, the leftover Winded will spread to other nearby foes. (Max 10) </br> </br>Range: 8 Blocks

Healing 50% of your max health within 10s will summon a rotating orb that damages enemies upon contact. (Max 3 orbs)

Total Damage: 150% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 120%)
 (Fire: 30%)
Range: 7 Blocks
Area of Effect: 1.5 Block (Circle-Shaped)
Duration: 20s
You gain a walk speed buff after casting Heal or Arcane Transfer. </br> </br>Effects: +80% Walk Speed </br>Duration: 4s </br>Cooldown: 8s
Increase your maximum Mana Bank by +30.
Increase your maximum Winded by +10.
Shoots Meteor from you as a slow projectile. </br> </br>Range: +18 Blocks
Reduce the mana cost of Ice Snake. </br> Mana Cost: -5

Deal damage in an area on the location you Teleport to.

Total Damage: 80% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: 60%)
 (Fire: 20%)
Area of Effect: 3 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)
Reduce the mana cost of Meteor. </br> Mana Cost: -5
When your Mana Bank reaches 120, casting Arcane Transfer will rapidly unleash the last 3 spells you've cast in order.

Creates an area of effect when sprinting that increases the walk speed of all allies the longer they run in it. (You lose 30% Speed Bonus every second once you stop running) </br> </br>Effect: +10% Walk Speed to Allies (per 1s, +300% Max) </br>Area of Effect: 2 Blocks (Circle-Shaped)

Ice Snake will add +3 Winded to enemies and deal more damage.

Total Damage: +30% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +15%)
 (Air: +15%)
Increase your maximum orbs from Ophanim by +1.
Ice Snake will freeze enemies for 2s. </br> </br>Effect: 100% Slowness to Enemies </br>Duration: 2s

Increase the damage of Sunshower.

Total Damage: +80% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: +50%)
 (Water: +20%)
 (Fire: +10%)

Meteor, Ice Snake, and Wind Slash will add +8 Mana to your Mana Bank for each aggressive enemy you hit. With Thunderstorm, Meteor only adds +2 Mana. </br> Arcane Restoration will restore mana 0.1s faster.
Increase your maximum Winded by +10.
Enemies will deal -0.5% damage for every Winded they have.
Increase the health of your orbs from Ophanim by +3000.
Increase your maximum Mana Bank by +30.
Double Meteor's speed.

Increases your maximum orbs from Ophanim by +3 and reduces their damage.

Total Damage: -30% (of your DPS)
 (Damage: -20%)
 (Water: -5%)
 (Thunder: -5%)

Healing 250% of your max health within 10s will make your next Heal activate Sunflare. </br> While Sunflare is active, you will restore health and mana to all nearby allies, and your Ophanim orbs will attack constantly. </br> </br>Range: 12 Blocks </br>Health Regen: 5% per second (of your max health) Mana Regen: 5% per second (of your max mana) </br>Duration: 10s </br>Cooldown: 20s
Increase your Max Orbs from Lightweaver by +2.
Arcane Transfer will allow you to overflow your mana over its maximum limits. (Max 300)

Using Heal while sneaking will absorb up to 60  Winded from enemies, making you Timelocked. </br> Timelocked turns Teleport into a deadly piercing ray, provides flight and prevents mana drain. </br> All enemies will receive boosted damage as  if they had the Winded you absorbed. </br> </br>Range: 12 Blocks </br>Duration: +1.25s (per 5 Winded absorbed, Max 7.5s)
Reduce the mana cost of Heal. </br> Mana Cost: -5
If you have more than 100 Mana, casting a spell will give you +5 Mana over 2s.
Chaos Explosion will cast +2 spells.
